name: Football Fantasy
description: This game is inspired by real life event that currently happened. You are the manager for Manchester United and you have currently signed top players to help you win the trophy this season, Players are going on international break right after the game and the Team board want you to top the table before international break. you are playing against Aston Villa , currently top 6 on the table. Your  Coaching Career is on the line, your decision will either get you fired or keep as a head coach.
